Package rendering.filledBox

Class FilledBoxShader

java.lang.Object
rendering.shaders.ShaderProgram
rendering.filledBox.FilledBoxShader
public class FilledBoxShader
extends ShaderProgram
Handles the interaction with the GUIFilledBox vertex and fragment shaders.
